assessment_item.subject: Ethics And Indian Culture
assessment_item.title: PZQL7E-Q10-பாதீடு என்பதன் பொருள்
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

பாதீடு என்பதன் பொருள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பகிர்ந்துண்டு வாழ்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2455"},{"text":"

போரில் கிடைத்த பொருளைப் பகிர்ந்தளித்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2456"},{"text":"

விருந்தினரை உபசரித்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2466"},{"text":"

பிற உயிர்களை நேசித்தல்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2471"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"PZQL7E-Q10-பாதீடு என்பதன் பொருள்","title":"PZQL7E-Q10-பாதீடு என்பதன் பொருள்","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Ethics And Indian Culture","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
